sentences.en: Addressing smoking cessation in tuberculosis control.
Arrange smoking cessation advice in contemplative of reducing or stopping tobacco consumption.
sentences.cn: 为打算减少或停止烟草消耗吸烟者中提供戒烟建议.

sentences.en: Certain drugs produce extremely slow or faint breathing or cessation of breathing.
sentences.cn: 某些药物能使呼吸变得极慢或微弱,甚至使呼吸停止.

sentences.en: Chapter V Duration, Cessation and Invalidation of Patent Right.
sentences.cn: 第五章专利权的期限 、 终止和无效.

sentences.en: Christakis said, smoking initiation followed the same patterns cessation : people started and stopped smoking in groups.
sentences.cn: 不过,克里斯塔克斯博士说, 开始吸烟和停止吸烟都遵循着相同的模式: 团体行为.

sentences.en: ECRA applies to the sale or transfer of, or cessation of operations at, any " industrial establishment ".
sentences.cn: 《环境净化责任法》适用于任何 “ 工业产业 ” 的出售、转移, 或者经营的终止.

sentences.en: Harmlessness requires the cessation of the consumption of flesh.
sentences.cn: 无害要求停止食用肉类.

sentences.en: He would not agree to a cessation of hostilities.
sentences.cn: 他不会同意结束敌对状态。
它意味着结束, 休息.

sentences.en: Mexico called for an immediate cessation of hostilities.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥要求立即停止敌对行动。

sentences.en: Nonunion is cessation of normal reparative sequence of fracture healing.
sentences.cn: 骨折的正常愈合过程终止,称之为骨不连.

sentences.en: Removal of the inducer results in immidiate cessation of enzyme synthesis.
sentences.cn: 除去诱导物就会立即终止酶的合成.

sentences.en: Smoking cessation may improve natural fertility and success rates with infertility treatment.
sentences.cn: 戒咽可改进自然生育力和不孕症治疗的成功率.

sentences.en: The density and structure of epidermal LC returned to normal 8 days after cessation of UVR.
sentences.cn: 停止照射后8天LC密度及结构基本复原.

sentences.en: The money saved from the cessation of the road project will be invested in public transport.
sentences.cn: 停止筑路项目省下的资金将投入公共交通.
